name: ExpressibleByDictionaryLiteral
desc: A type that can be initialized using a dictionary literal.

items.name: associatedtype Key
items.desc: The key type of a dictionary literal.

items.name: associatedtype Value
items.desc: The value type of a dictionary literal.

items.name: init(dictionaryLiteral: (Self.Key, Self.Value)...)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized with the given key-value pairs.
